songs.title: Walking in Place
songs.lyrics:
Walking in place
With the smoke out of our face
And then we see you

Hellos and goodbyes
The door still shuts in our eyes
And we still leave you

And all that is hoped for
Is after this while girl
I hope that you smile
While you're singing
After your smiles gone
And after that time girl
Lord after this while, you're singing

Turn to your friends
And then we'll ask you again
If it was alright
Round some other bend
To some other end to some other
Or some other night

And all that is hoped for
Is after this while girl
I hope that you smile
While you're singing
After your smiles gone
And after that time girl
Lord after this while, you're singing

(x4)
